name: BlinkConnect Media

overview:
BlinkConnect Media is an innovative web based service that offers mobile text messaging (SMS) and automated voice alerts for appointments, reservations, notifications & mobile marketing.

The BlinkConnect service was created by a team of business owners, for business owners. Whether youâ€™re in the restaurant, automotive, beauty and spa, healthcare, education or any other industry, weâ€™ve created the solution for you.

Use our waitlist and reservation scheduling tool to send your customers a text message (SMS) for appointment reminders or to let them know their product or service is ready (think table or car). Then use our mobile marketing tool to send your customers targeted communication, including discounts and promotions – whether it be a drink special while theyâ€™re waiting for their table or a 24-hour promotion to boost business on a slow day. Use our notification tool to send text message alerts to anyone, such as to students on a snow day or on-the-go updates to conference attendees. BlinkConnect truly has the solution to revolutionize any industry.
